titles.title: Expressing support for the goals and ideals of Children's Book Week.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.
Ms. Woolsey moved to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H. Res. 1333.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Early Childhood, Elementary, and Secondary Education.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and Labor

committee.subcommittee: Early Childhood, Elementary, and Secondary Education
committee.name: House Education and Labor

bill.summary: 5/12/2010--Passed House without amendment. Supports the goals and ideals of Children's Book Week. Encourages parents to read with their children and schools, libraries, and community organizations to hold events to encourage children and students of all ages to read.
